sawbladeDeath:
Died due to missing a sawblade.
(Press $%qt_dodge$ to dodge!)
latenoteDeath:
Died due pressing the notes too late. (Health) 
(Kade Input)
lowQualityGraphicsDesc:
If checked, disables some background details,
decreases loading times and improves performance.
optimizeGraphicsDesc:
If checked, Removes almost everything from the stage, 
Boosting FPS For Low-End PCS 
it uses stage's color when possible
shadersGraphicsDesc:
If unchecked, disables shaders.
It's used for some visual effects, and also CPU/GPU intensive for weaker PCs.
charactershadersGraphicsDesc: Same as above, but for the characters.
globalAntialiasingGraphicsDesc:
If unchecked, disables anti-aliasing, increases performance
at the cost of sharper visuals.
persistentCachingGraphicsDesc:
If checked, graphics will continue to be cached in memory after they are loaded, making reload times basically instant.
WARNING: This uses a lot of memory!
precacheGraphicsDesc: If checked, the game will Pre-Cache images.
gpurenderingGraphicsDesc: If checked the game will use your GPU to render images. [EXPERIMENTAL, takes effect after restart]
fullscreenGraphicsDesc: If checked the game will be maximized
localevisualsUIDesc: Changes the language of the game, need to have the Locale File of the language
colorblindFiltervisualsUIDesc: Changes the filter used to make the game more accessible to colorblind people.
camMovevisualsUIDesc: If unchecked, the camera won't move when you hit a note.
flashingvisualsUIDesc: Uncheck this if you're sensitive to flashing lights!
camZoomsvisualsUIDesc: If unchecked, the camera won't zoom in on a beat hit.
scoreZoomvisualsUIDesc:
If unchecked, disables the Score text zooming
everytime you hit a note.
pauseMusicvisualsUIDesc: What song do you prefer for the Pause Screen?
comboStackingvisualsUIDesc: If unchecked, Ratings and Combo won't stack, saving on System Memory and making them easier to read
usePlayerUsernamevisualsUIDesc:
If checked, this mod will use your computer's username
in some menus and texts
showMEMvisualsUIDesc: If unchecked, hides the Memory Counter.
showStatevisualsUIDesc:
Whether to display the current state and substate of the game example: 
(State: options.OptionsState) 
(SubState: options.VisualsUISubState)
qtOldVocalsgameplayDesc: If checked, will use the old voices from the original QT mod.
qtSkipCutscenegameplayDesc: If checked, disables the cutscene for Censory-Overload.
hitsoundVolumegameplayDesc: Sets how loud the hitSounds should be. 0 means disabled.
ghostTappinggameplayDesc:
If checked, you won't get misses from pressing keys
while there are no notes able to be hit.
autoPausegameplayDesc: If checked, the game will automatically freeze itself when not in focus.
noResetgameplayDesc: If checked, pressing Reset won't do anything.
controllerModegameplayDesc:
Check this if you want to play with
a controller instead of using your Keyboard.
ratingOffsetgameplayDesc:
Changes how late/early you have to hit for a 'Sick!'
Higher values mean you have to hit later.
sickWindowgameplayDesc:
Changes the amount of time you have
for hitting a 'Sick!' in milliseconds.
goodWindowgameplayDesc:
Changes the amount of time you have
for hitting a 'Good' in milliseconds.
badWindowgameplayDesc:
Changes the amount of time you have
for hitting a 'Bad' in milliseconds.
safeFramesgameplayDesc:
Changes how many frames you have for
hitting a note earlier or late.
inputSystemgameplayDesc: Which input system the game should use, changes some difficulty
qtBonkgameplayDesc: If checked, will play a different sound for the sawblade hit sound.
noteSplashesgamehudDesc: If unchecked, hitting 'Sick!' notes won't show particles.
hurtNoteAlphagamehudDesc: Allows you to customise how opaque the hurt notes are to allow you to read charts easier.
downScrollgamehudDesc: If checked, notes go Down instead of Up, simple enough.
middleScrollgamehudDesc: If checked, your notes get centered.
opponentStrumsgamehudDesc: If unchecked, opponent notes get hidden.
laneunderlaygamehudDesc: If unchecked, will appear a Lane Underlay.
laneunderlayAlphagamehudDesc: Allows you to customise how opaque the Lane Underlay are.
timeBargamehudDesc:
If checked, will show the bar showing
 how much time was elapsed/song name/song length.
timeBarUigamehudDesc: What should the Time Bar look like?
coloredHealthBargamehudDesc:
If unchecked, the health bar will have set colors
rather than colors based on the icons.
healthBarAlphagamehudDesc: How much transparent should the health bar and icons be.
